trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Sristialla appears to be in considerable distress.
TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_SRISTIALLA_000_000<tab>Oh, stranger, please tell me you saw a group of four children while making your way here. I swear, they vanished in the space of an eyeblink!

TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_SRISTIALLA_000_001<tab>I've told them it's dangerous to wander about by themselves, what with the damage from the riot and the sheer drop to the ocean below, but they never listen. And now I can't find them anywhere...
TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_SRISTIALLA_000_002<tab>Would you please help me search for them? The longer they're left to their own devices, the greater the chance that they'll come to harm.
TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_SRISTIALLA_000_003<tab>Honestly, I take my eyes off of them for a single moment...
TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_CHILDA3522_000_010<tab>Mother wants us home? But we're playing hide-and-seek!
TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_CHILDC3522_000_012<tab>Tell Mother that we're not going near the ocean, so we'll be fine. And tell <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> if you find anyone else!
TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_CHILDA3522_000_014<tab>We'll go home when we're done playing!
TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_CHILDC3522_000_016<tab>If she wants us home faster, she can help me look...
TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_SRISTIALLA_000_020<tab>Oh, for the love of─ But I'm glad that they're safe. Thank you.

TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_SRISTIALLA_000_021<tab>I may be a bit too cautious, I admit. But you must understand, we have no way of knowing what's going on above. When that monster suddenly appeared in the sky, I didn't know what to think. And what if there are more?
TEXT_LUCKZH012_03522_SRISTIALLA_000_022<tab>I'm their mother─it's my job to keep them safe. And I will. Oh, I am going to make them scrub so many pots for this...
